terms.definition: Columbia-Suicide Severity Rating Scale Lifetime/Recent Version - What sort of reasons did you have for thinking about wanting to die or killing yourself? Was it to end the pain or stop the way you were feeling (in other words you couldn't go on living with this pain or how you were feeling) or was it to get attention, revenge or a reaction from others? Or both? (Lifetime).
terms.preferredTerm: C-SSRS Lifetime/Recent Version - Reasons for Most Severe Ideation (Lifetime)

terms.definition: Columbia-Suicide Severity Rating Scale Lifetime/Recent Version - What sort of reasons did you have for thinking about wanting to die or killing yourself? Or both? (Past 1 Month).
